body:
Hi Greg,










The command that you suggested returns the usage options for rcollate in
windows. (ie.  Usage: rcollate [-h[io].....)






Earlier, I had tried feeding the file to rcollate via stdin through using
pipe ( | ) as well as the 'type a.txt' shell command in windows but didn't
get it work either way.










Thanks,


Sarith
